DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether consumption test dairy product effective reduce upper gastric discomfort 2 week product consumption .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Consumption Dairy Product Upper Gastric Discomfort
DOC.criteria: Male female 21 60 year old Experiencing upper gastric discomfort Participants alarm symptom ( dysphagia , bleeding , involuntary weight loss clinically significant > 10 % habitual weight last 6 month ) . Participants diagnose severe organic esophageal medical history ( endoscopic eosophagitis A , B , C D Los Angeles classification , peptic stenosis , Barrett oesophagus , huge hiatus hernia paraesophageal ) gastric duodenal ulcer high digestive haemorrhage clinical history .
